long_description: This stylish Dorfman Pacific All Season Crushable hat features great looking fedora styling with a western flair-excellent and affordable headwear for outdoor adventurers. Wool felt construction holds its shape well even in the rain; crushes to fit in a bag or pack and snaps right back into shape. Cotton twill interior head band for itchless comfort against your forehead. Dorfman Pacific All Season Crushable hat includes a leather hatband. Please note: the Olive Green color is slightly darker than it appears online.
short_description: This stylish Dorfman Pacific All Season Crushable hat features great looking fedora styling with a western flair-excellent and affordable headwear for outdoor adventurers.
